channel.title: Deadpool's Security Blog
channel.description: Hi, I'm Tushar. I'm a Musician, Magician & a nerd for Application Security. This blog is about some of the stuffs I do

item.title: Welcome !!
item.description:
Hi There!

This is my blog. I’m using Jekyll-Uno theme for it. It’s currently undergoing some changes. I’ll be adding some content shortly. Till then enjoy your stay.

If you have any questions or anything, feel free to coment below. You can also catch me up on Twitter or shoot me an email.

"House blowing up builds character." - Deadpool
